summary: Completed comprehensive testing of auth system with JWT, registration/login endpoints, and modern UI. Backend APIs working correctly (92.9% success rate) and frontend redirect issue has been resolved.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 when no token provided

ui_bugs.issue: Error message not displayed in UI for invalid credentials
ui_bugs.selector: Error message selectors not showing content
ui_bugs.details: API correctly returns 401 but UI doesn't show error message to user

passed_tests: Redirect to dashboard after successful auth - FIXED
Dashboard page loading with user data

items: Fix error message display in frontend for invalid login credentials
